item.title: The Usage of ADM PV-RCNN
item.description: The Usage of ADM PV-RCNN Type: Technology Blog Tags: Docker; LiDAR; 3D Computer Vision Note This document mainly introduces the use of ADM PV-RCNN Docker container, details can be seen here. This Docker container contains a complete pipline working files from LiDAR to algorithm model. This Docker container can process the Pcap format data packets collected by LiDAR. Currently, it only supports data collected by four types of LiDAR produced by Robosense: RS-LiDAR-16, RS-LiDAR-32, RS-LiDAR-64 and RS-LiDAR-128.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me def welcome(): print("Hello! This is Jensen Zhang!") return ğŸ˜Š Welcome to visit my homepage! I am a senior student in the Department of Computer Science and Technology, Anhui Agricultural University, and I will graduate from college at the end of June this year. In October 2020, I got the opportunity to study for a master’s degree without an examination. This September, I will enter Hefei University of Technology to continue my studies.
